product_name: Garmin VIRB Anti-Glare Screen Protectors - Package of 3
long_description: The Garmin VIRB anti-glare screen protectors reduce sunlight glare, minimize fingerprint smudges and help protect against scratches on your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera. Includes 3 per package.
short_description: The Garmin VIRB anti-glare screen protectors reduce sunlight glare, minimize fingerprint smudges and help protect against scratches on your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera.
